TopicTitle: Camera in VAB keeps moving away from wen right clicking to pan the camera

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows | CPU: ryzen 7 | GPU: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1660 | RAM: idk

 

Was building a rover in the VAB, and for some reason my camera started doing this glitch which made it impossible to build -

Every time I right clicked to pan the camera, my camera would teleports in front of the craft a considerable amount, totally messing up my alignment when adding parts to my vehicle.  I would then press the scroll wheel to realign my camera, but whenever I right clicked to pan the camera at all it immediately snapped away and again made it impossible to build.
